page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: It was a big day in my life - it was our county show. I woke up at 8 o'clock and went to the bathroom to have a wash and get dressed. I had my breakfast of egg and bacon . I walked to the showground and gave the man on the gate my ticket. With my Father and his Marshal tractor I helped to pull some buses out of the mud in the car park. I walked to my traction engine and got it going. By now it was time for my mum to get lunch for the 50 people involved with the traction engines. For lunch I had four beefburgers and a cup of tea. After that I walked round the fairground and won a goldfish on the darts game. By then it was time to go. I covered the engine up and walked home. For dinner I had roast beef, Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes, carrots,peas and cabbage.I went to bed at 9 o'clock.
